pli-tv-pvr1.3:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for having sexual intercourse, in how many of the four kinds of failure does one fail out?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.3: one may fail in morality;  one may fail in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, in how many ways does one fail out of the four kinds of failure?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:3.1: The third section on failure is finished.
